text: Ondu vele allahanu nimage enadaru hanimada bayasidare, avana horatu bere yaru adannu nivarisalararu mattu avanu nimage enadaru hitavannu madabayasidare, avana audaryavannu tadeyalu yarigu sadhyavagadu. Avanu tanna dasara paiki tanicchisidavarige adannu talupisuttane. Avanu tumba ksamisuvavanu mattu karunamayiyagiddane
